intro.title: GroupEffect
intro.desc:
Provides a way to group multiple animation effects together, similar to SequenceEffect.

When animated it synchronises to start all the effects all at the same time.

entries:
effects

are a group of animations played together at once.

intro.title: SequenceEffect
intro.desc:
Provides a way to group multiple animation effects together, similar to GroupEffect.

When animated it synchronises effects to play one after the other has finished, as per the order defined from the effects parameter.

entries:
effects

are a group of animations played in order.
